title: loading ques
body:
Hi there, just wondering when your going to do something about these loading cue's?
ive been waiting about 45mins to get into a game and by the time the accept comes some one disbans into it, this has been happning alot lately not just for me but my mates to, i wouldnt care if i could play from home but my flatmates are to usless to pay for the net in the first place, and im not keen to shout the whole house internet so ive been playin via internet cafe. ilike the old ranked cue better at least you would be in game by about 3 mins...{{summoner:14}}

replies.body: its sooo bad right now hope riot can fix this
do you have the same problem? yea i like the old cues way better
